description.p: You have thick, leathery skin. When you aren’t wearing armor, your AC is 14 + your Constitution modifier. You can use your natural armor to determine your AC if the armor you wear would leave you with a lower AC. A shield’s benefits apply as normal while you use your natural armor.

sheet.description: When you aren’t wearing armor, your AC is {{titan skin}}. You can use your natural armor to determine your AC if the armor you wear would leave you with a lower AC. A shield’s benefits apply as normal while you use your natural armor.

description.p: Tending towards militarianism, the "Titans" will sometimes come into conflict with others who encroach on their territory.
Hardy You have a natural armor deriving from your tough life-style. Your AC is 13 + Constitution Modifier.
Combat Training You have also gained proficiency in Martial Weapons through intense training.
Night Sight Your kin have developed Dark Vision through a tendancy for nocturnalism.
